content.name: ssc
content.description: (Applies to physical deployments only.) Information about System Status Cards (SSCs) in the  storage system.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier for the SSC's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the SSC needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - SSC needs replacement.
  • false - SSC does not need replacement.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the SSC.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the SSC.

attributes.name: parentDae
attributes.description: Parent Disk Array Enclosure (DAE) of the SSC.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the SSC.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the SSC.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the SSC, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model number for the SSC.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Slot where the SSC is located in the parent enclosure.
